body.name: COOFANDY Men's Casual Button Down Shirts Short Sleeve Textured Linen Summer Beach Shirt with Pocket
features: Textured Fabric --- Men's short sleeve button down shirt is made of premium textured fabric, which is breathable, soft and skin-friendly, keeping you cool and comfortable in the summer.
Unique Design --- Mens beach shirts features short sleeve, spread collar, button closure, chest pocket, relaxed fit. The unique slight vertical rib texture makes this shirt more stylish and simple.

Collocation --- This men button up shirt makes a perfect versatile item and can easily be worn with to match with shorts, jeans, trousers. Adding to your current collection that creat sophisticated look.
Occasions --- Short sleeve summer shirt suitable for casual daily wear, beach, tropical aloha theme, camp, school, office, beach, wedding, yoga, work or other leisure activities.
Garment Care --- Machine Wash casual button-down shirt,please check the product picture for size details.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Stylish and comfortable casual shirt. Great price too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Perfect Addition to the Wardrobe
reviews.reviewText: Pros:This light blue polyester button-up shirt has truly impressed with its fantastic features:1. Captivating Color: The color of this shirt is an absolute winner. The light blue hue adds a refreshing touch to any outfit, making it a standout piece.2. Unique Texture: The unique texture of the fabric adds an interesting dimension to the shirt, setting it apart from the ordinary. It's a delightful detail that catches the eye.3. Quality Craftsmanship: The seams of this shirt are impeccably sewn, and there are no annoying loose threads around the buttonholes. It's evident that attention to detail went into its creation.4. Wrinkle-Free Care: A practical advantage is its easy maintenance. Simply toss it in a cold wash with like colors, and a warm dry, leaves it wrinkle-free and ready to wear.5. Accurate Sizing: For someone who is 6'2" and 215 pounds, the XL size fits as expected, ensuring a comfortable and flattering fit.Cons:Surprisingly, there are no drawbacks to mention. This shirt has exceeded expectations in all aspects.My Take: In conclusion, I absolutely love this shirt. Its stunning color, unique texture, and flawless craftsmanship make it a standout piece in my wardrobe. The hassle-free care and accurate sizing are the cherries on top. If you're looking for a stylish and comfortable addition to your attire, this shirt is a must-have.Additional Information:As a Vine reviewer, I fully understand the impact my reviews can have on fellow consumers. Just like you, I rely on reviews when making my own purchasing decisions. Therefore, I'm committed to providing valuable insights to those considering the products I review. Additionally, given that I'm obliged to pay taxes on the retail value of the products I receive (approximately 40%, with 15.3% in Social Security/Medicare taxes and 25% in Federal Income taxes), I prioritize delivering honest reviews for every item I receive.For reference, here's how I rate products:- 1 Star: Do not buy. This item has serious flaws.- 2 Stars: Do not buy. Not as bad as a 1 Star, but it still has major downsides.- 3 Stars: Buy if you can't find an alternative. There are some issues that need to be worked out.- 4 Stars: Recommend purchase. This item met my expectations.- 5 Stars: I love this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars His New Favorite Shirt
reviews.reviewText: My partner loves this shirt. He wore it the day after I gifted it to him and his dad literally wanted the same shirt. My partner is 6'4" and the shirt doesn't hang awkwardly off his shoulders or anything. I recommend this as a gift from your partner just because it's adorable how much they might geek over this shirt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs very small
reviews.reviewText: This shirt feels very nice and my partner really likes the look. Unfortunately, it runs small. We got his size and should have sized up one as the shirt buttons up but it is tight, which means the buttons look like they're under pressure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars light comfortable attractive shirt
reviews.reviewText: This is a lightweight shirt and very comfortable. The texture is a little more subtle in person than in the photos, but it looks great. I was pleased to find that it doesn't wrinkle as easily as some other linen shirts I have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well constructed, true to description, may be a bit expensive.
reviews.reviewText: I didn't take any stars off for it, but this may be a bit expensive for what you get. It's currently listed just under thirty bucks, and the material is wholly synthetic, very lightweight, and not necessarily that much better than a big box retailer. Other than that....The shirt seems well constructed. The fabric is obviously synthetic, but soft to the hand and hangs well. It's not completely wrinkle-free, but does well at being resistant. Being synthetic, you don't need to worry about shrinking.The color seems true to the description and pictures (mine's a light green). I followed the size chart they gave to choose my size and the fit is as expected. I suggest you do take a quick measurement if you can - on this shirt the circumference of your chest is what you wanna size to, most likely. You can double-check the waist measurement ("natural" waist is about at your belly button), to make sure that size will fit your middle, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I just wore this on my trip to Colorado
reviews.reviewText: Wow, how comfortable and stylish! I just wore this on my trip to Colorado and am very impressed with the quality and comfort of this shirt. Its very light weight yet durable and the verticle lines in the pattern are very attractive. I rarely buy clothing online because its often times too difficult for me to find a shirt that I like and fits well. Well I've found both qualities in this shirt and will definitely buy a few more in different colors. I chose the dark navy blue color and love it. I generally wear a large and thats what I ordered and it fit perfectly! I give this COOFANDY Men's Casual Button Down Short Sleeve Shirt 5 Huge Stars for style, comfort and quality. You won't be disappointed.
